{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-16T17:16:49.000Z", "description": "

Position: Site Reliability Engineer

Location: Remote till Covid, Weehawken, NJ

Type of job: Contract



JOB Description 



  • location: the initially remote post that Weehawken US once situation normalize.

 

 

 

Primary skills for a new SRE:

 

  • Linux administration
  • Bash shell scripting
  • Experience with Azure or another cloud provider
  • Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience with Application performance monitoring tools.
  • Experience with any languages for querying log data \u2013 search processing language (Splunk), Kusto (Azure), Kibana query language (Elasticsearch)
  • SQL
  • Understanding of SRE concepts.
  • Git

 

 

Additional skills:

  • Python
  • Infrastructure as code (Terraform, Puppet, Chef or Ansible)
  • DevOps build automation and CI/CD (Gerrit, Maven, Jenkins, Nexus, Artifactory, Selenium)

 




Thanks 

Ashwini

4085569096

ashwini@tsourceinc.net
